channel.title: JP's Coding Blog
channel.description: Recent content on JP's Coding Blog

item.title: MT5: GPU Performance
item.description: Exploring model performance via CUDA MT5? This project focuses on analyzing the output differences between MT5, with PyTorch, and compared with Tensorflow, to understand deeper which version of software is optimal for performance on a GPU cluster.

item.title: CS Deep Learning
item.description: Exploring Transformers applied to NeRF This page briefly describes my invovlement within the end of semester deep learning project.

item.title: Markdown Syntax
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Placeholder Text
item.description: Lorem est tota propiore conpellat pectoribus de pectora summo.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: About
item.description: Written in Go, Hugo is an open source static site generator available under the Apache License 2.
